title.narrative: NGO Support / Support to the socially marginalised communities in the Southern Africa

description.narrative: African sovieties are challenged by serious problems i.e. shortage of food, health, unemployment, hiv/aids, ecological issues, instability, urbanuzation, violence and xenophobia. Activities are implemented through churches, whose role in African societies is central.They however lack competence and capacity to respond to these needs. The aim of this programme is to increase the capacities of the local partner organisations to become competent in responding to the challenges. The target groups of the pilot programme are the marginalised and most vulnerable members of the communities. Regional approach is needed because problems do not respect national borders. The activities can not be covered by CUAHA network, which is focusing on hiv/aids related issues and whose constituency is different from that of Lunodia.
